I have the Air Intake label stuck. I click away, click on it, then click away. Its still there... Very annoying. Anyone has a fix for it?

Edited August 29, 2014 by Claw
tags

Hey RussianCactus,

Depending on what version of KSP you are using, you could be running into a clicking issue with the game itself. Sometimes things won't go away. You can try right-clicking elsewhere, going to map mode, or to the space center and return.

Also, I went ahead and moved your post out of the old thread, since mechanics have changed a bit since then.

Cheers,

~Claw

Edited August 29, 2014 by Claw
Going to the map and back always fixes it for me, and is really fast - hit M twice and you are done.
Right-clicking in open space closes them unless they are open through Resources window. Then you need to uncheck the box in Resources window and they'll go away.
